10

Starbucks managers seek raise after tip ruling

The move is in response to a court ruling that found Starbucks Corp. owes Massachusetts baristas more than $14 million for breaking tipping laws. (Globe, 12:46 p.m.)
  • Discuss Is it OK for Starbucks managers to share in tips?

Families: 2 Mass. women drown in Mexico

The women were pulled out to sea as they walked in shallow water at their Cancun resort, according to the widower of one of the women. (AP, 12:35 p.m.)
Pictures

Pac-Man? It's an MIT hack, man

The latest trick by the crafty folks at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology was to create a dot-chomping display above the famed dome. See past pranks.
  • Pac-Man appears on MIT’s Great Dome
  • Your Campus: MIT  |  More Your Campus sites

Lynn residents charged in $490,000 scheme targeting MassHealth

A staffer at a private company that administers MassHealth's transportation system is accused of cashing in on phony claims, officials said. (Globe, 12:25 p.m.)

Hard Rock to unveil Big E casino deal

The deal between Hard Rock International and the Eastern States Exposition in West Springfield is expected to be announced at a red carpet event. (Globe, 11:50 a.m.)
More coverage of casino gambling in Massachusetts

Nurses blast Patrick's retiree health plan

The Massachusetts Nurses Association criticized the Governor Patrick's plan to force retired public employees to pay more for their health care. (Globe, 11:19 a.m.)
